title: Client
body: Has the client been crashing a lot for anyone else? It's been happening to me frequently since 6.17.  It's disappointing to go into ranked only to win Diamond 5 promos to then be forced out because the client keeps crashing on me...

replies.body:
Could you please verify if you're facing similar symptoms? 

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/ewAGq5Xv-game-is-taking-up-1-2-mbps-dedicated-yet-running-very-slowly-freezing-disconnecting-glitching
Sorry, but I don't get these problems. My client just frequently : disconnects, crashes, freezes.

> [{quoted}](name=Baulne,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=lvrHt250,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-09-25T00:53:25.277+0000)
>
> Sorry, but I don't get these problems. My client just frequently : disconnects, crashes, freezes.

This is likely caused by a poor connection to the game servers. Most of the time, incompatible network settings are the prime cause for such issues. As a first step, I suggest working through the steps in our [connection troubleshooting guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if that guide helped.
Alright.. Good luck with your issue buddy!
